description.author: Ryan Mulligan et al.
description.synopsis: Tool for semi-automatic updating of nixpkgs repository
description.description: nixpkgs-update provides tools for updating of nixpkgs packages in a semi-automatic way. Mainly, it is used to run the GitHub bot @r-ryantm, but the underlying update mechanisms should be generally useful and in a later version should be exposed as a command-line tool.
